abstract: Carl C. Icahn reported an 11.3 percent stake in Take Two Interactive Software and said he may seek conversations with Take Two representatives about the American video game publisher.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn reported an 11.3 percent stake in Take Two Interactive Software and said he may seek conversations with Take Two representatives about the American video game publisher.
lead_paragraph: Is Carl C. Icahn planning to make Take-Two Interactive Software his project for 2010?

headline.main: Is Icahn Setting His Sights on Take-Two?
